experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.description: A journey through my academic background and professional experience

exp1.title: IT Project Manager - Optima Retail
exp1.description:
- Managing a team of 6 developers
 - Sprint organization
 - Estimation of development task points
 - Scrum Master
 - Task tracking with JIRA
- Interaction with internal and external clients (Listening to needs and turning them into tasks)
 - Direct reporting to CEO

exp2.title: Tech Lead - Optima Retail
exp2.description:
- Ensuring code quality (SOLID principles)
 - Reviewing pull requests for pre-production environment
 - Technical definition of tasks

exp3.title: Software Developer - Optima Retail

 - Version control with GIT
 - Using MySQL databases

exp4.title: PHP Laravel Developer - Abalit Technologies
exp4.description: - Developing REST APIs with Laravel for mobile app backend
